onlyGetIf: You can only get it if

notMarried.list: you were married to, or in a civil partnership with, your partner when they died
notMarried.p: You can only get it if you were married to, or in a civil partnership with, your partner when they died.

deathOver12m.list: your spouse or civil partner died after 6 April 2014
deathOver12m.p: You can only get it if your spouse or civil partner died after 6 April 2014.

notInUK.list: you lived in the UK when your spouse or civil partner died
notInUK.p: You can only get it if you lived in the UK when your spouse or civil partner died.

belowStatePension: You can only get it if you were below State Pension age when your spouse or civil partner died.
getBereavementPayment: If your spouse or civil partner died within the last year, you may still be able to get Bereavement Payment.
